text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar "Alex is doing an excellent job" by Trump standards. He is failing America with his response to the Coronavirus just like his boss, Trump. When the inept and incompetent are leading this is what to expect. Too bad it means the death of tens of thousands of Americans. Failure!
